channel.title: [PI]Wildy Icon
channel.description:
Hey ;)
My friend has a little problem... When he goes in wildy, the wilderness icon doesnt appear. It's still the wilderness and he can attack players only he cant see the icon.
Any idea how to fix this?
ty Vrac
